name: King Rhoam
desc: King Rhoam was once the king of Hyrule Kingdom and the father of Zelda.

name: Purah
desc: Director of the Hateno Ancient Tech Lab.

name: Impa
desc: Impa presides as the elder of Kakariko Village.

name: Paya
desc: Paya is a young Sheikah woman who lives in Kakariko Village.

name: Robbie
desc: Robbie is a Sheikah who researched Guardians at the Royal Ancient Lab before the Great Calamity.

name: King Dorephan
desc: King Dorephan is the reigning monarch of Zora's Domain

name: Mipha
desc: Mipha was the Princess of the Zora, one of the Champions. She has a gift for healing, known as Mipha's Grace.

name: Daruk
desc: Daruk was the Goron Champion, He possessed the ability known as Daruk's Protection.

name: Revali
desc: Revali was the Champion of the Rito. Revali had the ability to create an Updraft that allows him to soar into the air, later named Revali's Gale after him.

name: Urbosa
desc: Urbosa was the Gerudo Champion. She was also the chief of the Gerudo in life. She was capable of manipulating Lightning, which is a power known as Urbosa's Fury.

name: Kass
desc: Kass is a minstrel who travels throughout Hyrule Kingdom in search of the 'Ancient Songs'. He has left his family and his hometown of Rito Village to fulfill the final wish of his teacher, the Court Poet

name: Master Kohga
desc: Master Kohga is the leader of the Yiga Clan, an opposing Clan to the Sheikah who hunt Link on a ceaseless mission.
